title: Wickramasinghepura valuable Land For sale.
details:
20 perch Square Land.
Location- Pelawatta , Wickramasinghepura.
500 M from Boralla Bus Route.
Wickramsinggurpa Road is a 30 foot wide road.
Access to the land is 20 foot.
2nd block of main road.
Road frontage is about 60 foot.
high evaluation Land.
700 m from Thawathugoda Junction, Hemas Hospital, Food city's, Super Markets.
It's a great opportunity if you're investing in a land.
1.6 Million per perch.
On a clear day you could see Adam's peak which is almost on the east coast of Sri Lanka from Wickramasinghepura as it is one of the most Tallest Hills in Colombo District
